title: Social Sector Job Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and core job-related competencies
context.additional_context: Experience-based blended learning environment for strengthening field applicability of professionals (medical/legal/technical), with smartphone-centered limited-technology infrastructure

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three job-contextualized solution strategies by analyzing real-world social issues.
Learners can self-assess core competencies and develop improvement plans through task performance designed according to constructive alignment principles.
Learners achieve over 80% mastery of field-applicable knowledge through blended learning experiences combining mobile devices with offline activities (role-playing/case studies).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
